item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-09
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at The Mall at Chestnut Hill (199 Boylston Street, Chestnut Hill). #
  • Bacon Cheeseburger @ charley's #
  • Comcast & OpenDNS don't seem to be playing well again. I just had to go back to using the Comcast DNS servers on my router. #
  • I smile every time I check out the Watchmensch page on Amazon "Customers buy this book with Watchmen by Alan Moore" - #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
